item.title: Capture Full Size Screenshot on Chrome without Extension
item.description: Chrome’s new Developer Tools has a way to capture high quality full size screenshot of the page so you don’t have to have an extension for it anymore! Update for latest Chrome versions: Chrome DevTools was slightly changed so here are the new steps (tested in Version 71.0.3578.98 (Official Build) (64-bit) on macOS). Open the website that you want to capture Use Ctrl + Shift + J shortcut on Windows/Linux or Cmd + Opt + J on Mac to open Developer Tools.
